item.dc:creator: @JoshuaCoombs JoshuaCoombs
item.description:
@JoshuaCoombs wrote:

[quote=“ravensword, post:31, topic:538010”][quote author=JoshuaCoombs link=topic=656837.msg4397074#msg4397074 date=1389469956]

from as to what i can gather, the (assets store framework) is the base. or something. i he does have a licence… its a personal project i think, not sure though.

the guys just tryna do his own thing. he said private project. hes no different to any of us lot. tryna reach out for the community

However he claimed that this is fully his. therefor the matter’s were taking further . The actual developers confirmed he is lying .
[/quote]

i think he ment the project was his as he said the base was 2.0. i pm’d him. he said

The Base Is FPS Kit 2.0 I Am Using That As a Base. This Is A Private Project Just For Fun. But I Dont Have The Source Anymore As I Am Returning Back To Just Playing Games Like (Dead Frontier). Sorry If I got Your Hopes Up.

My reply was

Okey man just asking as you have alot of haters…

His reply was

I Noticed, But They Just Dont Like Me FullStop[/quote]

Lock this post. He is full of shit lol

Read full topic

item.description:
@JoshuaCoombs wrote:

[quote=“naseem142, post:27, topic:538010”][quote author=JoshuaCoombs link=topic=656837.msg4396985#msg4396985 date=1389457876]

I’m sure he isn’t the one selling it, otherwise the first letter of each word would be capitalized
[/quote]Ah damn, you beat me to it.

Also, he isn’t buying or selling anything. He’s only promising a finished product, which may never happen.

So this thread won’t continue to develop as i understand , unless he actually knows how to work with Unity and tries to do something with the kit.
In that case this thread is useless until he answers?

i Guess not but check my post above i contact the developers who confirmed hes lying

Yeah i did see that , Good investigating :D[/quote]

Thank’s mate i cant wait to see his reply !

item.title: (Development Game (COD Style)
item.dc:creator: @JoshuaCoombs JoshuaCoombs
item.description:
@JoshuaCoombs wrote:

[quote=“Scarecrows, post:13, topic:538010”][quote author=lineage link=topic=656837.msg4395606#msg4395606 date=1389026871]
No This is the first project of my kind, my v2 Framework will be released in Febuary
[/quote]

No this is 100% a FPSKIT you can find online for Unity3D. I have the exact same one, and you are showing absolutely nothing different than is in the version I downloaded. If you don’t believe me I can upload screenshots of the EXACT same game.

Don’t download things and then claim them as your own. Especially if you have absolutely nothing else more to showoff than is in the original version.[/quote]

This man is doing nothing but ripping other peoples shit. Lock.

https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/#/content/4652
